A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Story line unfolds and unfolds and unfolds and goes. . .no where.  After A Force Awakens and Rogue One\, HOW could they mess this up so badly?  I've followed Star Wars since the beginning.  Most of the movies (including this one) I first saw around midnight for the opening show.  I LOVE STAR WARS!!!  But The Last Jedi\, except for a few good scenes\, is just boring to watch\, sometimes even painful.
